frame.name: Reflex Glass
frame.subtitle: A fast-paced price action training game
frame.description: Reflex Glass is a high-speed chart reading game built around pure price action. You get seconds to decide: BUY or SELL. No indicators. No signals. No noise. Just real market structures and your ability to read them under pressure. Train your pattern recognition, build streak multipliers, and see if you actually understand charts â€” or just thought you did.
frame.tagline: This is harder than it looks
frame.ogDescription: BUY or SELL in seconds. No indicators. Just chart.
